description.en: Fundamental systems, mechanics, and beginner-friendly guides that apply to the entire game.
description.jp: ゲーム全体に共通する基本的なシステム・メカニクス・初心者向けガイド。
description.kr: 게임 전반에 적용되는 기본 시스템, 메커닉, 초보자용 가이드.

adventure.title: Adventure
adventure.description: Strategies to progress through Adventure mode.

world-boss.title: World Boss Guides
world-boss.description: Form the best teams to defeat massive enemies.

skyward-tower.title: Skyward Tower

joint-boss.description: Find synergy to grab the maximum point.

monad-gate.title: Monad Gate
monad-gate.description: To help you find your way through this labyrinth and overcome its enemies.
